mapper.select: SELECT p1.*,p2.name AS "catelog_name",p3.nickname AS "author" FROM problem p1 LEFT JOIN catelog p2 ON p1.catelog = p2.id LEFT JOIN user p3 ON p1.author_id = p3.id WHERE p1.contest_id = -1 AND p1.id=#{value}
SELECT p1.*,p2.name AS "catelog_name",p3.nickname AS "author" FROM problem p1 LEFT JOIN catelog p2 ON p1.catelog = p2.id LEFT JOIN user p3 ON p1.author_id = p3.id WHERE p1.id = #{problemId}
